<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/json/array">json::Array</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/kernel/key/#a1958a762261549463a280bac3274d6d5">Args</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Idx = 0, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/tgtok/#abbc5259d649363016626e2529fabe0c5ada09b995722faae2fac3dacfddd27999">Dag</a>-&gt;getNumArgs(); Idx &lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>; ++Idx) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/json/array">json::Array</a> Arg;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::move(Obj);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Final fallback: anything that gets past here is simply given a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// kind field of &#39;complex&#39;, and the only other field is the standard</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#39;printable&#39; representation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.isConcrete());</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-jsonbackend-cpp-/jsonemitter/#a410599bd3c103f2faa1069c91ae02b57"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-jsonbackend-cpp-/jsonemitter/#a410599bd3c103f2faa1069c91ae02b57">JSONEmitter::run</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;OS) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/json/object">json::Object</a> Root;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Root&#91;</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;!tablegen&#95;json&#95;version&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#93; = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Prepare the arrays that will list the instances of every class.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We mostly fill those in by iterating over the superclasses of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// each def, but we also want to ensure we store an empty list for a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// class with no instances at all, so we do a preliminary iteration</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// over the classes, invoking std::map::operator&#91;&#93; to default-</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// construct the array for each one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::map&lt;std::string, json::Array&gt; InstanceLists;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;&#91;ClassName, ClassRec&#93; : Records.getClasses())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">    InstanceLists.emplace(ClassRec-&gt;getNameInitAsString(), <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/json/array">json::Array</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Main iteration over the defs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;&#91;DefName, Def&#93; : Records.getDefs()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::string Name = Def-&gt;getNameInitAsString();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/json/object">json::Object</a> Obj;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/json/array">json::Array</a> Fields;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/recordval">RecordVal</a> &amp;RV : Def-&gt;getValues()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Def-&gt;isTemplateArg(RV.getNameInit())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Name = RV.getNameInitAsString();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RV.isNonconcreteOK())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Fields.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/json/array/#ad48bca6da17d659a87749a8bf543e35b">push&#95;back</a>(Name);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Obj&#91;Name&#93; = translateInit(&#42;RV.getValue());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Obj&#91;</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;!fields&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#93; = std::move(Fields);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/json/array">json::Array</a> SuperClasses;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add this def to the instance list for each of its superclasses.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;&#91;<a href="/docs/api/classes/superclass">SuperClass</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a>&#93; : Def-&gt;getSuperClasses()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">      InstanceLists&#91;SuperName&#93;.push&#95;back(Name);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Obj&#91;</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;!name&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#93; = Name;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Obj&#91;</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;!anonymous&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#93; = Def-&gt;isAnonymous();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/json/array">json::Array</a> Locs;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smloc">SMLoc</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a> : Def-&gt;getLoc())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Locs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/json/array/#ad48bca6da17d659a87749a8bf543e35b">push&#95;back</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5f3f23062c5d5636bee27c54f4a407f0">SrcMgr</a>.getFormattedLocationNoOffset(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Obj&#91;</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;!locs&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#93; = std::move(Locs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Root&#91;Name&#93; = std::move(Obj);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make a JSON object from the std::map of instance lists.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/json/object">json::Object</a> InstanceOf;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;&#91;ClassName, Instances&#93; : InstanceLists)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">    InstanceOf&#91;ClassName&#93; = std::move(Instances);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Root&#91;</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;!instanceof&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#93; = std::move(InstanceOf);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Done. Write the output.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">  OS &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/json/value">json::Value</a>(std::move(Root)) &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
